StringTable.Label: DesertWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Lots of room, but few natural resources and barely any arable land.

StringTable.Label: TerrestrialWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A world balanced with multiple biomes.

StringTable.Label: ParadiseWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A rare world of amazing potential

StringTable.Label: JungleWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A world benefitting strong growth and strong defenses. It's not hard to hide in a giant forest, is it? More effort required to clear land for farming does hamper food production and is also costly.

StringTable.Label: ArborealWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A world that can feed an Empire.

StringTable.Label: VolcanicWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Abundant power is nice, but boy do the earthquakes get old. Terrible for anything food or growth related but a strong contender for an economy and|or manufacturing focused planet.

StringTable.Label: MountainousWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Tall mountains and deep ravines cover this planets surface. Reduced space for farming impacts food production and growth, but an abundance in minerals significantly aids manufacturing and income.

StringTable.Label: TropicalWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: All other planets are ugly by comparison. High humidity, aggresive fauna and lots of aggressive ivy make maintenance of infrastructure and manufacturing a pain. Great for farming though!

StringTable.Label: BombardedWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Mostly destroyed but there may be some interesting technology among the rubble.

StringTable.Label: ThinAtmosphereWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Great for growing food, but not so great at growing people.

StringTable.Label: LowGravityWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Low Gravity, helpful to manufacturing, and tourists love it.

StringTable.Label: AquaticWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A massive ocean doesn't leave enough land for standard colonization.

StringTable.Label: CorrosiveWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Acidic lakes and storms makes this world unsuitable for standard colonization but a great source of Elerium! Constructed beam ships take 15% less manufacturing to construct. Constructed beam ships do 15% more damage.

StringTable.Label: CorrosiveWorldB_Dec
StringTable.String: Acidic lakes and storms makes this world unsuitable for standard colonization but a great source of Elerium! Constructed Beam ships take 30% less manufacturing to construct. Constructed Beam ships do 30% more damage.

StringTable.Label: FrozenWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Temperatures are too low for standard colonization.

StringTable.Label: BarrenWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Lack of any biomass makes standard colonization impossible.

StringTable.Label: ToxicWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Atmosphere is too toxic to support standard colonization. Tourism isn't it's strong suit because well... only an true buffoon vacations on a toxic world, no?

StringTable.Label: RadioactiveWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Radiation Levels are too high for standard colonization. Source of antimatter. Constructed Missile ships take 7.5% less manufacturing to construct. Constructed Missile ships do 7.5% more damage.

StringTable.Label: RadioactiveWorldB_Dec
StringTable.String: Radiation Levels are too high for standard colonization. Source of antimatter. Constructed Missile ships take 15% less manufacturing to construct. Constructed Missile ships do 15% more damage.

StringTable.Label: RadioactiveWorldC_Dec
StringTable.String: Radiation Levels are too high for standard colonization. Source of antimatter. Constructed Missile ships take 30% less manufacturing to construct. Constructed Missile ships do 30% more damage.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoon_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor world carved from a the fragment of a Thulium world. Constructed ships have 15% more range - Any type. Constructed ships have 7.5% worse accuracy.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonB_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor world carved from a the fragment of a Thulium world. Constructed ships have 30% more range - Any type. Constructed ships have 15% worse accuracy.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloud_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor world constructed through collected Durantium asteroids Constructed Kinetic ships take 15% less manufacturing to construct. Constructed Kinetic ships do 15% more damage.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudB_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor world constructed through collected Durantium asteroids Constructed Kinetic ships take 30% less manufacturing to construct. Constructed Kinetic ships do 30% more damage.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAccelerator_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor world built from a crystalized Promethium. Boost movement speed by 0.125 * the class of the planet. E.G: class 42 planet = 10.5 extra moves.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorB_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor world built from a crystalized Promethium. Boost movement speed by 0.25 * the class of the planet. E.G: class 42 planet = 10.5 extra moves.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellites_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor world that still has a massive array of orbiting relics.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevator_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor world with a fully intact space elevator.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefinery_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor world that has been completely converted to be a refinery Constructed ships take 15% less manufacturing to construct Constructed ships have 15% more moves.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryB_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor world that has been completely converted to be a refinery Constructed ships take 30% less manufacturing to construct Constructed ships have 30% more moves.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor World, with 3 vast orbital factory rings. That greatly increases all manufacturing potential of the world. Constructed ships have 15% better armor.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldB_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor World, with 3 vast orbital factory rings. That greatly increases all manufacturing potential of the world. Constructed ships have 30% better armor.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor world that was once the sight of exotic scientific experiments.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasury_Dec
StringTable.String: Once the capital of the Precursor Civilization.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantine_Dec
StringTable.String: A once wealthy world quarantined by the Precursors. What remains is so toxic that it is uncolonizable without work.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A world thought to have been used by the Precursors for dangerous experimentation. It will take a great deal of work to make it safe to colonize.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrison_Dec
StringTable.String: A mysterious world that was once used as a Precursor Prison. Its atmosphere has been poisoned, making it impossible to colonize without a great deal of work

StringTable.Label: ShardOfTheMithrilar_Dec
StringTable.String: A strange, ancient energy seeps from this world.
